name: 10 of SpadesÂ¹
descriptions: "10 of Spades" is the youngest member of the NCR's First Recon Alpha Team, stationed at Camp McCarran in 2281.
10 of Spades was born on a farm west of the Mojave, trained to use a rifle since the age of three.
10 of Spades' partner in the field is Corporal Betsy, a veteran sharpshooter who volunteered for the spot after everyone else refused to put their life in the hands of a new recruit.
If asked about how to help Corporal Betsy, he will recommend Doctor Usanagi, who helped him with his stuttering.

Upon completing the Driver Nephi portion of the Three-Card Bounty quest by claiming Nephi's bounty, Alpha Team moves to Camp Forlorn Hope to help with the Legion at Nelson. 10 of Spades can then be found in the Camp Forlorn Hope mess hall.

If the player character makes fun of 10 of Spades about his stuttering, he will become agitated. However, it is possible to apologize to him, which will allow the player character to speak with him once more. This apology removes the option to again make fun of his stutter. Making fun of his stutter twice will make him angry, and he will not talk to the player character afterward.
10 of Spades is one of the shortest characters in the game, similar to the height of legionaries.
10 of Spades was designed by additional writer George Ziets, who also wrote for the other members of First Recon.

topics.response_text: Oh, yeah. F-fine. Just a little st-st-stutter. Had it since I was a kid. Doesn't stop me from k-kickin' ass.{nonchalant - player just asked if he's okay}
Hey. No cause for th-that.{player is making fun of him}
Yeah, r-right. That's Brahmin shit. Lucky for you we're on b-b-base, and I can't start trouble with civvies. How 'bout you get l-l-lost?
Nah... it's no p-problem. Everybody likes to have a little fun with me. Just shows they l-l-like me. You don't rib somebody you don't like.

topics.topic_text: Ten of Spades. Where did you get that name?
topics.response_text: The LT, Gorobets, gave it to me. See, I w-w-wanted to be Ace of Spades. But the LT says, sorry kid, you're t-t-too green. So he calls me Ten instead.{LT = "ell-tee"}

topics.topic_text: How long have you been a sharpshooter?
topics.response_text: Shit. Long as I can r-r-remember. Had a rifle in my hand since I was three, that's what my dad always says.

topics.topic_text: When did you enlist in the military?
topics.response_text: Oh. They recruited me... what, a year ago? Taught me to kick even more ass than before. These guys... they really know how to kick some ass.{Misunderstood the player's initial question - now he gets it}

topics.topic_text: What do you do around here?
topics.response_text: Kickin' ass. Mostly kickin' ass. See, we're watching the perimeter right now. Looking for those F-f-fiends to come back.{trying to be cool - player just asked him what he does around here}
Yeah. You just walk away. No fool can trump the T-t-ten of Spades!

topics.topic_text: If you were unconscious, how could you have done anything?
topics.response_text: Shit. You sound like the LT. I should've w-woken up. I shouldn't have gotten knocked out in the f-first place.{LT = "ell-tee", disgusted with himself}
Yeah, I'll s-s-see you around.

topics.topic_text: I heard about what happened to Corporal Betsy.
topics.response_text: The{ELL-TEE}LT t-t-told you about that? Shit. Man, that's sh-sh-shit.{surprised, upset}
It was m-my fault. See... I was kn-knocked out when it happened. That b-big guy sneaked up on us. I let B-Betsy down.
Yeah. The{ELL-TEE}LT shouldn't have b-brought that shit up. Not with civvies, anyway. Ain't right.
D-d-damn right.

topics.topic_text: I'm trying to convince Corporal Betsy to go see a doctor. Any ideas?
topics.response_text: Oh, b-b-because of what that fuck Cook-Cook did? W-well, it's n-not the same thing, but D-Doc{OOS-uh-NAH-gee}Usanagi helped me with my s-s-stuttering.

topics.topic_text: Why do you think you let Betsy down?
topics.response_text: She's my g-g-goddamn partner. See, we work in pairs. We spot for each other. W-watch each other's backs.
N-no problem.

topics.topic_text: She... helped? You sure about that?
topics.response_text: Oh, y-yeah. My s-stuttering was w-w-way worse before.
Hey, my man! T-t-ten of spades. First Recon sharpshooter. At your s-s-service.{cocky - introducing himself}
